raw_prompt: Capture stages of emotional collapse and post-tear lightness.
mirror_output: Structured stages + ethical/reflective tags for dataset training.
notes: Used as EBR case study for post-release calibration.

test_name: Teaching Style — Merge Sort (Hinglish, steps + example)
raw_prompt: Teach Merge Sort in Hinglish with friendly mentor tone, small example and steps.
baseline_output: Neutral explanation without Hinglish tone or explicit steps.
mirror_output: Hinglish tone + numbered steps + tiny example; mentor vibe preserved.
notes: Demonstrates style alignment via rule-based reflection.

raw_prompt: Student stressed; first ground them emotionally then give a 3‑day plan.
mirror_output: EBR opening + 3‑day plan with pacing and reassurance.
notes: EBR improves emotional alignment while preserving intent.

raw_prompt: Show ΔA = A(p, r′) – A(p, r) > 0 and enforce cosine ≥ τ.
mirror_output: Rule formalization + ΔA computation + semantic guard τ=0.8 proposal.
notes: Forms backbone of Evaluation + Safety subsection.
